thread.title: Victory Awaits You Kukurantumi Chief Tells Mahama
thread.title_full: Victory Awaits You Kukurantumi Chief Tells Mahama

title: Victory Awaits You Kukurantumi Chief Tells Mahama
text:
Politics | 19 October 2015 10:21 CET Victory Awaits You – Kukurantumi Chief Tells Mahama Source: Starrfmonline.com 
The Chief of Kukurantumi in the Eastern region, Daasebre Boamah Darko has assured President John Mahama of victory in 2016 for doing a good job during his tenure. 
The chief made the comments on Saturday at a ground breaking ceremony for the rehabilitation of phase one of the 20km Koforidua-Bunso road. 
The project is being executed by Kofi Job Construction firm using equipment from Engineers and Planners. 
The contract is being done at a cost of GHC32 million and it’s expected to be completed within 18months. 
Daasebre Darko added that President Mahama has been ordained by God as a leader of the country and should not be afraid of a defeat in next year’s election. 
President Mahama delivering a speech said the project is part of a number of road construction projects being executed by his government with the Cocoa road Fund.
